permission.header.title: Necessary permission for your KIOS experience
permission.body.heading: Push notifications
permission.body.text.a: Please enable push notifications in your system settings to receive necessary alerts (redemption confirmation, cancellation, and more) for your KIOS loyalty redemption.
permission.body.text.b: To allow push notifications, go to Settings > KIOS > Notifications and turn on 'Allow notifications'
term.header.title: Please agree to use KIOS app
secret.header.title: Create your wallet
secret.header.subtitle: Your wallet for loyalty collection/redemption
import.body.text.a: Please enter the private key you copied from your old device in the space below to continue using your existing wallet on this device.
pin.enter.title: Enter 4-digit passcode
pin.enter.subTitle: Enter 4-digit passcode
pin.set.title: Set Your Passcode
pin.set.subTitle: Re-enter your passcode
pin.locked.title: Screen locked
pin.locked.subTitle:
Wrong PIN {{maxAttempt}} times.
Temporarily locked in {{lockDuration}}.
phone.header.title: Phone number verification
phone.header.subtitle: Verify yourself to start redeeming KIOS loyalty
phone.body.text.a: Enter the three one-time passwords (OTP) from the SMS you received. Match the numbers in the text (#1, #2, #3) to verify.
wallet.heading: My KIOS Loyalty
wallet.heading.description: KIOS Loyalty can be redeemed for goods and services at any THE9 kiosk
wallet.modal.heading.description: Once your points are converted to tokens, you can't convert them back to points and your future loyalty will be collected in tokens.
wallet.history.header.title: Loyalty collection/redemption history
wallet.redeem.use.fail: Redemption authentication failed. Please contact support.
wallet.redeem.header.title: KIOS Loyalty redeemed
wallet.redeem.header.subtitle: Redeem KIOS Loyalty
config.wallet.alert.import.fail: Unable to import your wallet. Please try again.
config.wallet.alert.import.done: Your wallet has been successfully imported.
config.wallet.header.title: Wallet management
config.wallet.header.subtitle: Export/import your wallet
config.wallet.modal.heading: Your private key
config.wallet.modal.body.text.a: Enter this key on the app installed on your other device to restore your current wallet. (Select 'Import your wallet' on the app on your other device)
config.wallet.modal.body.text.b: Warning: Never expose or share your private key. Anyone with your private key can access and steal assets in your wallet.
